titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to the listing of patents in the Orange Book.
A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to the listing of patents in the Orange Book.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
